rma.status_check: To check the repair status, please enter our RMA number or the device serial number.

home.slogan: Focusing on the root cause, not just quick replacement.

intro.welcome: Welcome to pda.repair, your new, independent expert for professional repair and technical support for all types of PDA devices (Mobile Data Terminals, Handheld Terminals).
intro.approach: We are your specialized partner for the sustainable repair and value preservation of your mobile data collection devices.
intro.philosophy: Unlike pure exchange programs, we specifically look for the cause of the problem to offer a durable and cost-effective solution.

paid.title: Independent Repair Service for All Brands:
paid.description: We offer our paid repair service for PDA devices from all manufacturers and brands. Whether it's a broken display, defective scan engine, battery problems, or software errors â€“ we analyze the damage and provide you with a transparent cost estimate.
paid.clientele: This service can be used by end customers as well as manufacturers, importers, or other service centers.

warranty.title: Warranty Processing (currently only for Movfast):
warranty.notice: Please note: We can currently only perform warranty repairs or repairs under service contracts for devices of the Movfast brand.
warranty.instruction: If you wish to make a warranty claim for a Movfast device, please be sure to state the name of your reseller in the RMA form.

process.title: The Repair Process - Simple and Transparent

step1.title: Fill out RMA Form:
step1.text: To ensure quick processing, please fill out our Online RMA Form. A detailed description of the error significantly helps us with diagnosis and speeds up the repair process.

step2.title: Pack Device Securely and Send:
step2.text: Send your defective device well-packaged, ideally with a copy of the completed RMA form, to our service address: pda.repair, Repair Service, Hamburgerstr. 16, 65760 Eschborn, Germany. You bear the shipping costs to us.

step3.title: Incoming Inspection & Cost Estimate:
step3.text: Upon receipt of your package, your RMA request will be activated. We check the device and the described error and create a free cost estimate for the repair (except for recognized Movfast warranty cases).

step4.title: Repair After Approval:
step4.text: As soon as you approve the cost estimate, we will carry out the repair professionally.

step5.title: Return Shipping:
step5.text: After successful repair, we will send your device back to you. We cover the costs for return shipping within Germany.

step6.title: Status Tracking:
step6.text: Via our website, you can check the current status of your repair at any time using the RMA number or the device's serial number.

eckwms_measure.description: Measure carton dimensions easily and quickly with a PDA and our printable coordinate grid.
eckwms_measure.image_alt: EckWMS coordinate grid for carton measurement
